title: Little Farms Table, Sentosa Cove Restaurant
blurb: Unforgettable Dining, Exceptional Quality, Served with Heart.
description: Little Farms Table at Sentosa Cove offers a dining experience focused on exceptional quality and heartfelt service. The restaurant provides a welcoming atmosphere for families and individuals alike. Enjoy a variety of dishes prepared with fresh ingredients, perfect for a memorable meal. The location at Sentosa Cove adds to the charm, making it an ideal spot for a relaxing dining experience. The restaurant aims to provide a family-friendly environment where everyone can enjoy delicious food and create lasting memories. The menu features a range of options to cater to different tastes, ensuring a satisfying experience for all.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free on Sundays.

title: Little Farms Bistro, Katong Point Restaurant
blurb: In the heart of Joo Chiat, open daily for dining.
description: Little Farms Bistro at Katong Point offers a delightful dining experience with a focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients. The bistro provides a relaxed atmosphere suitable for families and individuals alike. Enjoy a diverse menu featuring brunch, lunch, and dinner options, including vegetarian and gluten-free choices. The restaurant is committed to sourcing sustainable and ethically produced food, ensuring a healthy and delicious meal for everyone. Perfect for a family outing or a casual meal with friends, Little Farms Bistro provides a welcoming environment and exceptional service.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free on Sundays.
